author: PTI
title: COVID-19: China shuts down largest makeshift hospital in Wuhan, last batch of medics leave
description: As the number of coronavirus cases abates, China shutdown one of its largest makeshift hospitals built in February to treat the surging COVID-19 infections in Wuhan, the epicentre of the pandemic.
content: BEIJING: As the number of coronavirus cases abates, China on Wednesday shutdown one of its largest makeshift hospitals built in February to treat the surging COVID-19 infections in Wuhan, the epicentre of the pandemic, as the last group of thousands of medica… [+2379 chars]
